job.title: Research Scientist
job.description: We are a small group of cybersecurity Ph.D. researchers, seasoned developers, and entrepreneurs. Our company is on a mission to secure open source software ecosystem against software supply chain attacks. We are currently looking for a researcher/developer with expertise in cybersecurity and malware analysis, and a strong background in Python. You will we working closely with the founders and advisors to create the first-ever large-scale security analysis platform. We are truly excited about this space, and look forward to working with you to keep the open source ecosystem safe.
